meanings.definition: A chemotherapy drug used to treat various types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cisplatin to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: She received cisplatin treatment to combat her illness.
meanings.sent3: The cancer cells were no match for the powerful cisplatin.
meanings.sent4: Like a warrior, cisplatin battled the cancer within her body.
meanings.sent5: The effects of cisplatin on the cancer were remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The lab technician analyzed the structure of cisplatin under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Cisplatin is known for its unique molecular composition.
meanings.sent3: The students marveled at the complexity of cisplatin in their chemistry class.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of cisplatin's molecular design was truly fascinating.
meanings.sent5: Under the right conditions, cisplatin exhibits remarkable properties.
